name: Lost Time
description:
Hello this is my first game and also first game jam I have participated in!

Its a game where you play as a duck that has lost his windup key. Because of that time as you move your time is limited. You have to find all the pieces to the key in order to win!

Controls:

W = up on main menu

S = down on main menu

A = Left

D = Right

Spacebar = Jump / interact with menu screens

Escape = Go back to main menu
